channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Man behind New Year’s attack visited New Orleans before, recorded video with smart glasses, FBI says
item.description: He also recorded video of the French Quarter with hands-free glasses, the FBI says.

item.title: Drawn to New Orleans’ iconic street of celebration, a night of partying becomes a nightmare
Major US winter blast shuts down schools and government offices in several states
